verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*,

To \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, \add my\add* dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w son|strong="G5043"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \add and\add* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w I|strong="G2192"\w* \w thank|strong="G5485"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \add my\add* \w forefathers|strong="G4269"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, \w that|strong="G5613"\w* without \w ceasing|strong="G0088"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w remembrance|strong="G3417"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w prayers|strong="G1162"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*;

Greatly \w desiring|strong="G1971"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, being \w mindful|strong="G3415"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may be \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* with \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*;

When I \w call|strong="G2983"\w* to \w remembrance|strong="G5280"\w* the \w unfeigned|strong="G0505"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* that \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w dwelt|strong="G1774"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w grandmother|strong="G3125"\w* \w Lois|strong="G3090"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w Eunice|strong="G2131"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* I am \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\w* I \w put|strong="G0363"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* in \w remembrance|strong="G0363"\w* that thou stir \w up|strong="G0329"\w* the \w gift|strong="G5486"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the putting \w on|strong="G1936"\w* of \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G1325"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w fear|strong="G1167"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* of \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of a sound \w mind|strong="G4995"\w*.

Be \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G1870"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* ashamed \w of|strong="G1870"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* of \w me|strong="G1691"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* be thou partaker of the \w afflictions|strong="G4777"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

Who hath \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \add us\add* with an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, which was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w world|strong="G5550"\w* \w began|strong="G0166"\w*,

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G5319"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w appearing|strong="G2015"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, who hath \w abolished|strong="G2673"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* hath \w brought|strong="G5461"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immortality|strong="G0861"\w* to \w light|strong="G5461"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*:

\w Where|strong="G3739"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* am \w appointed|strong="G5087"\w* a \w preacher|strong="G2783"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w teacher|strong="G1320"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* cause \w I|strong="G3958"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* suffer these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*: \w nevertheless|strong="G0235"\w* I \w am|strong="G1870"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G1870"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* am \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* to \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* that \w which|strong="G3866"\w* \w I|strong="G3450"\w* have \w committed|strong="G3866"\w* unto him \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

Hold \w fast|strong="G2192"\w* the \w form|strong="G5296"\w* of \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* good \w thing|strong="G2570"\w* which was committed unto \w thee|strong="G3872"\w* \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* which \w dwelleth|strong="G1774"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5124"\w* thou \w knowest|strong="G1492"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* they which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w* be turned away \w from|strong="G0654"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*; of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w Phygellus|strong="G5436"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Hermogenes|strong="G2061"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* unto the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Onesiphorus|strong="G3683"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0404"\w* \w oft|strong="G4178"\w* \w refreshed|strong="G0404"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1870"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G1870"\w* of \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w chain|strong="G0254"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w*, when he \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*, he \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w out|strong="G2212"\w* very \w diligently|strong="G4706"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \add me\add*.

The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w grant|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* that he may \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in how many \w things|strong="G3745"\w* he \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto me \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w knowest|strong="G1097"\w* very \w well|strong="G0957"\w*.
